tickets.subject: CMA Issue with Marketing Slicks
tickets.description:
Hello,

I got a call today from an Agent in the Menlo Park Office, Stacey Diodati Jamison.  She was creating a CMA and when she tried to add the Marketing Slicks, only one showed up on the Reports section.  However, when she previews the CMA, there are 8 slicks that are in the Preview.  Stacey would like to be able to see the list of slicks selected so she can modify the order. 

 

 

This is NOT how choosing Marketing Slicks has worked in the past.

 

Has anyone else reported this issue?

 

Mary Bitondo

TECHNICAL TRAINER

Alain Pinel Realtors®, Corporate

408.913.7938

650.224.8542

tickets.subject: Listing Status for LuxuryPortfolio.com (15-May-18)
tickets.description:
Dear MARKETING Admin,

You are receiving this email because you have a status of "Admin" for Alain Pinel Realtors on luxuryportfolio.com (http://www.luxuryportfolio.com) .

-------------------------------

Current LISTING STATUS for your company:

Total Active/Pending: 498

"Web Approved" (http://www.luxuryportfolio.com/agentdirect/index.cfm?email=marketing@apr.com&retloc=redirect.cfm?searchID=2D4F3149-D14A-4449-AA1C-6ADB67394A53) (live on luxuryportfolio.com (http://www.luxuryportfolio.com/browse~b/Alain_Pinel_Realtors.cfm) ): 412

Incomplete : Photos (i.e. less than 5 good quality photos) (http://www.luxuryportfolio.com/agentdirect/index.cfm?email=marketing@apr.com&retloc=redirect.cfm?searchID=A4E5A462-66BC-4981-9A3E-D07419A3B98A) : 1

Incomplete : Data (see below for detail) (http://www.luxuryportfolio.com/agentdirect/index.cfm?email=marketing@apr.com&retloc=redirect.cfm?searchID=1903C9E9-824D-48E1-8ED3-9F188D30A125) : 0

Incomplete : Photos and Data (http://www.luxuryportfolio.com/agentdirect/index.cfm?email=marketing@apr.com&retloc=redirect.cfm?searchID=A6F96E13-3339-4B6C-BCB7-7F6F7E6AF5E0) : 2

Web Declined : Photo Quality (http://www.luxuryportfolio.com/agentdirect/index.cfm?email=marketing@apr.com&retloc=redirect.cfm?searchID=D80F5459-815C-4572-865B-A542920F46F0) : 9

Web Declined : Under Construction (http://www.luxuryportfolio.com/agentdirect/index.cfm?email=marketing@apr.com&retloc=redirect.cfm?searchID=96ADF6A7-123B-45B2-831B-731E160DBDAE) : 0

Web Declined : Land/Lot (http://www.luxuryportfolio.com/agentdirect/index.cfm?email=marketing@apr.com&retloc=redirect.cfm?searchID=8F0AE575-768F-4370-B2FA-0E3D9324C39F) : 1

Web Declined : Price (http://www.luxuryportfolio.com/agentdirect/index.cfm?email=marketing@apr.com&retloc=redirect.cfm?searchID=9A1F323D-4574-49E9-AC89-5E503D336575) : 1

Do Not Display (http://www.luxuryportfolio.com/agentdirect/index.cfm?email=marketing@apr.com&retloc=redirect.cfm?searchID=EB137855-4504-4CCF-A5FC-2C415AE12415) : 10

Ready for QA (awaiting approval by Luxury Portfolio) (http://www.luxuryportfolio.com/agentdirect/index.cfm?email=marketing@apr.com&retloc=redirect.cfm?searchID=730BDBF0-CDAD-4F8C-A9E3-C1EDE4C7958F) : 27

Web Declined - Duplicate Listing (http://www.luxuryportfolio.com/agentdirect/index.cfm?email=marketing@apr.com&retloc=redirect.cfm?searchID=81FE298B-1C02-4383-BB21-6F69B2684FF5) : 31

Web Declined - Duplicate Photos (http://www.luxuryportfolio.com/agentdirect/index.cfm?email=marketing@apr.com&retloc=redirect.cfm?searchID=D881512D-2C6C-4601-8EA5-3F7F6A3E3D83) : 0

Last Activity Date: 15-May-18

Property Inquiries from April: 4

To see specific detail on your listings click here to access your Luxe Xchange account (http://www.luxuryportfolio.com/agentdirect/index.cfm?email=marketing@apr.com) .

Click here to download your listings in excel (http://www.luxuryportfolio.com/schtasks/excel_report.cfm?brokerId=4B2A214A-B42B-43AD-A02C-8876AA17BF0F) .

As a reminder, properties posted to the site must meet the following criteria:

* Priced at equivalent to US $999,900 or more (listings that fall below that price will remain in the site until 30% of the original list price) - unless property threshold has been modified by special arrangement.
* Residential listings only.
* We do not allow duplicate entries of the same property.
* Rentals ? you have the ability to market your luxury rentals on LuxuryPortfolio.com. This includes traditional rentals available on a monthly basis as well as ?vacation rentals? on a nightly, weekly and monthly basis.
* Photos

** Property must have five (5) good quality high-resolution photos.
** Photos with broker name or company logo watermarks will be declined for display on LuxuryPortfolio.com.
** Floor plans will not count as part of the required five photo images (floor plans may be included if you already have 5 photo images).
** Renderings are allowed if they are architectural perspective, full color illustrated renderings (always subject to approval).

* Vacant Land

** Approved with five (5) good quality, high resolution photos of exceptional views and/or site photography.
** Vacant lots that do not offer an exceptional location, views or other amenities will not be accepted.
** Properties marketed with/without or with a varying amount of land can be added up to two times if the price is significantly different and there are additional photos (always subject to approval).

* Construction

** Under Construction - approved with a minimum of 1 full color rendering and one "under construction" photo. The remaining 3 photos can be renderings, views or "under construction."
** Pre-Construction ? approved with a minimum of 1 full color rendering. The remaining 4 photos can be renderings, views or site photos.
** New Construction - We do not allow multiple units in the same building unless they are separately enrolled in the Development Collection. If we receive multiple units with the same photos (of a model for example), we will select a representative unit, note it as such in the remarks, and mark the others as duplicates in our system.

* Ad Copy

** All properties will be reviewed for grammatically correct ad copy and preferably should include a detailed property description.
** All ad copy is reviewed before being posted to the site ? copy will be checked/edited for errors, structure and flow.
** Abbreviations ('br' to 'bedroom') will be written out, excessive copy in CAPS and emphasis will be removed, complete sentences formed, etc.
** Links to other URLs in property descriptions will be removed in order to keep the LuxuryPortfolio.com browsing experience consistent for consumers.

If you have any questions or comments about luxuryportfolio.com, please contact us at any time.

If you have any questions regarding the information contained within this email,
please refer to our Terms of Use (http://www.luxuryportfolio.com/terms-of-use.cfm) and/or Privacy Policy (http://www.luxuryportfolio.com/privacy-policy.cfm) . http://www.luxuryportfolio.com
© Luxury Portfolio 2018

Susan

Cc: Susan Kingsley <skingsley@apr.com>
Subject: Website redirect

 

Hello, Help Team!

 

Agent Susan Kingsley would like her APR website to redirect to: https://thisfeelslikehome.com/ ; I noticed in SAVI that she does have this site listed under “Links” however when I click any of her “Visit my website” links they all direct to her APR site.

 

Can we check on this?

 

Thanks so much!

 

 

Stacey Tilford

TECHNICAL TRAINER

Alain Pinel Realtors®, Corporate

stilford@apr.com

 

The Experience is ALAIN PINEL (http://www.apr.com/)

tickets.subject: You're Invited: Upcoming Luxury Portfolio Training Webinars
tickets.raw_subject: You're Invited: Upcoming Luxury Portfolio Training Webinars
tickets.description:
Hello,

Over the past few years, our Luxury Portfolio webinar series has become a popular way to train sales associates on the LP program benefits. Training is essential to keeping them engaged in and making the most of your company’s Luxury Portfolio membership. We are pleased to announce that we will continue to offer a robust series of training webinars aimed at educating your agents on all the resources that are available via Luxury Portfolio to help them grow their businesses and sell their listings.

If you’d like to invite your sales associates to attend, please forward the message below which includes registration information for our upcoming training webinars:


You’re Invited to a Webinar: Learn How to Maximize your Affiliation with Luxury Portfolio International®


Luxury Portfolio is pleased to announce the following upcoming webinar dates below. In addition to the Program Review presentations, we will continue to present topic-specific webinar trainings aimed at providing a deeper dive into specific Luxury Portfolio tools and programs. Click on the “Register now” links below to reserve your seat in the webinar(s) of your choice:


Luxury Portfolio Program Review for Agents
Thursday, May 24, 2018 from 3 – 4 PM Central Time. Register now! https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/register/8971917412873465091
Please join us to brush up on the tools, benefits, and basics of the Luxury Portfolio program. Learn what is available to you and how to use the program effectively to grow your business and sell your listings! Topics to be covered include Luxury Portfolio facts & statistics, client communication tools, marketing materials & listing presentation resources, additional exposure opportunities and a brief tour of LuxeXchange.

Using the My Contacts Sections of LuxeXchange
Wednesday, June 13, 2018 from 3 – 4 PM Central Time. Register now! https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/register/7621062924593096963
Luxury Portfolio provides several different ways for you to easily and automatically communicate with prospects and customers—right from LuxeXchange. Join us for a webinar to learn more about the client communication tools available in the My Contacts section of LuxeXchange including a review of the tools, how to set up a new client, and get answers to frequently asked questions.

Online Banner Advertising for Properties: A Deep Dive
Tuesday, June 26, 2018 from 3 – 4 PM Central Time. Register now! https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/register/8161488282808400642
Join us for a webinar to learn more about how you can run targeted online banner ads for your listings! Find out how this unique offering from Luxury Portfolio can help you get ahead with brilliantly simple digital advertising. This webinar will walk through the basics of this tool, building and editing your ad campaign, monitoring campaign analytics, sending seller reports and more!


*PLEASE NOTE: Time Zones - 1 PM Pacific/2 PM Mountain/3 PM Central/4 PM Eastern


If you are unable to attend the webinars, we have saved a video recording & slides of the previous webinar presentations for download/viewing in the Program Information section of LuxeXchange. They are saved in Marketing Support>Presentations/Training Resources. You can download the recordings there and view them at your convenience.



Best,


Anne
